The pool and two saunas are excellent and the gym very good
The hotel has a fantastic 20 metre pool and sauan hamam area which is great both fro swimming and relaxing
Used fabulous pool breakfast fantastic waiter Kilian was especially attentive suggesting various breakfast options not considered

The central location tram stops outside the hotelThe pool big by hotel standardsThe breakfast buffet
